00014 namespace Brutha
00015 {
00016         class DfsTraversal : public Traversal
00017         {
00018                 protected:
00019                         vector<Move> moves;
00020                         vector<int> cancellations;
00021 
00022                         int limit;
00023                         int counter;
00024 
00025                         void search(Examiner &examiner, Cube state, Sequence &seq, int, int, int, int);
00026 
00027                 public:
00028                         DfsTraversal(vector<pair<Move, Move> > &_moves): cancellations(_moves.size() * 2, -1), limit(0)
00029                         {
00030                                 for(vector<pair<Move, Move> >::iterator it = _moves.begin(); it != _moves.end(); ++it)
00031                                 {
00032                                         if(it->first.fun)
00033                                         {
00034                                                 this->moves.push_back(it->first);
00035                                                 this->moves.back().index = this->moves.size() - 1;
00036                                         }
00037                                         if(it->second.fun)
00038                                         {
00039                                                 this->moves.push_back(it->second);
00040                                                 this->cancellations[this->moves.size()-1] = this->moves.size()-2;
00041                                                 this->cancellations[this->moves.size()-2] = this->moves.size()-1;
00042                                                 this->moves.back().index = this->moves.size() - 1;
00043                                         }
00044                                 }
00045                         }
00046 
00047                         virtual int getLimit();
00048 
00049                         virtual void setLimit(int limit);
00050 
00051                         virtual void traverse(Cube start, Examiner &examiner);
00052 
00053         };
00054 
00055 }
00056 
00057 #endif
